app_info.title: HomeLinkGH - Home Services Ghana
app_info.short_description: Trusted home services, food delivery & diaspora support for Ghanaian families worldwide.
app_info.full_description:
HomeLinkGH is Ghana's premier platform connecting families with trusted local service providers. Whether you're in Ghana or living abroad, easily book reliable home services and food delivery for yourself or your loved ones.

üåç DIASPORA SUPPORT

internal_testing.test_instructions:
HomeLinkGH Test Instructions:

1. Create account using test email
2. Browse available services by category
3. Test booking flow with sample address
4. Test payment flow (use test payment methods)
5. Test real-time tracking simulation
6. Test in-app messaging with providers
7. Test rating and review system
8. Test emergency service booking
9. Test diaspora booking feature
10. Test multi-language switching

Test Credentials:
Email: tester@homelinkgh.com
Password: TestDemo2025!

All payment testing should use sandbox/test environment.
